process.title: Process name
process.description: An arbitrary name for this project

dafaultType.title: Default activity type
dafaultType.description: A default activity type for activities where omitted the field 'type'

activities.title: Activities
activities.description: List of activities composing the process, when located in root level, or the subprocess, when located onto activity of type 'sub'

activities.title: Activities
activities.description: List of tasks admitted only for 'sub' task

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: A conditional expression to use only with activity type 'incond'

xgoto.title: Exclusive goto
xgoto.description: It puts an exclusive gateway after this task that follows the rules you write in an array of 'if-then' clauses

igoto.title: Inclusive goto
igoto.description: It puts an inclusive gateway after this task that follows the rules you write in an array of 'if-then' clauses

pgoto.title: Parallel goto
pgoto.description: It puts a parallel gateway after this task that follows the rules you write in an array of at least two task names to go to

goto.title: Go to
goto.description:
Indicates the task name to go to after completion of this task. This must be a string except for:

- activity types 'xgw' and 'igw', where it must be a list of 'if-then' clauses

- activity type 'pgw', where it must be a list of at least two task names to go to

items.title: If-Then
items.Description: A couple of a condition (inside 'if') and a consequent goto (inside 'then')

then.title: Then
then.description: A name of an element to go to if the conditional expression is true

activityTypes.title: Type
activityTypes.description: Optional parameter that indicates the activity type (that overwrites 'defaultType' root tag and has value 'task' if not specified)
